item.title: Don Cheadle and Ayo Edebiri to Make Broadway Debuts in ‘Proof’ Revival
item.description: Academy Award nominee Don Cheadle and Emmy, SAG and Golden Globe winner Ayo Edebiri will make their Broadway debuts next spring in the first New York revival of David Auburn’s Tony Award- and Pulitzer
